value:
Are you certain of this, Forseti?
That boy is... Hm. Perhaps it is
not my place.

The Miracle at the Tower of Dahna
was the blood contract that granted
us the power to challenge Loptous.

A summoning ability beyond powers
known even to the gods, they say...$k$pYet even here there are those who
seek to dominate any who oppose
them... Some things never change.

No matter the weapon you wield,
the principle is the same: aim for
your foe and strike.

I've heard others from Jugdral are
present as well... I hope to speak
with them if possible while here.$k$pI wish to warn them against placing
too much weight on the shoulders
of too few.

You are $Nu, are
you not?$k$pI wish you well in your friendship
with $Nf.
Witness strength awoken in me!

If my blood wills it, I would accept
this fight as my own...
This world is still strange to me...

True excellence is found in uplifting
those who cannot yet do as you do.

I am Ullr—once called crusader.
Should you have the heart to face
the myriad evils, my bow is yours.

Your power of summoning ranks
you among the godly. As such...
I must warn you of something.$k$pStrength can lead a people out of
darkness, but with such strength
comes darkness borne upon it...$k$pIn Jugdral, we forgot that lesson.
We grew arrogant...and invited
disaster upon ourselves.$k$pI do not claim to know the source
of your power, nor do I know how
you came by it...$k$pI do know, however, that it is real.$k$pWhile we look to the same horizon,
my strength is one with yours... I ask
only that we not stray from the light.
はあっ
I will shoot you through!
ああっ…
What...
My feet stand firm.
Guide my arrow, Yewfelle.
Know well my strength.
Perish!
My duty remains...
giggle
My name is Ullr... Once, I was called a crusader.
*gasp* What was that?
Strong light can guide us. It can drive away the darkness.
I wish to pass this bow to one with a worthy heart.
Men are men. If mankind turns its back on the gods, it is lost.
The dragon we defeated…it must never return to life.
It brings me joy to fight by your side for this worthy cause.
Very well.
What is it?
It will be done.
